victims.name: Breonna Taylor
victims.age: Song: One Dance feat. WizKid and Kyla

victims.name: Breonna Taylor, Age:26
victims.story: /Shortly after midnight on March 13, 2020, Breonna Taylor, a 26-year-old Black emergency medical technician, is shot and killed by police in her Louisville, Kentucky apartment after officers busted through her door with a battering ram .
